original: Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sa hetukam dhamma

original: paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko
analyzed: paṭicca na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ

original: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na ahetukaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā ahetukam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko
analyzed: paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ

original: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na ahetukaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca
analyzed: sa hetukam ca ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sa hetukañca

original: ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca
analyzed: ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sa hetukam ca ahetukañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sahetuko ca na ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava sahajāta vārampi pe pañhā vārampi vitthāretabba
